title: Suspect arrested with a stock of unregistered pesticides
content: The Police Special Task Force (STF) has arrested a person with a stock of unregistered and illegal pesticides in the Jumma Masjid Mawatha area in Periyamulla, Negombo.According to information received, a 50 year old man was arrested in a raid carried out yesterday.2150 packets of pesticides and 93 bottles of liquid pesticide were seized.
